title: Currently open connections are NOT viewable in "one single/collective area".
author: fhousen
body_snippet:
<!--
Only file GitHub issues for bugs and feature requests.  All other topics will be closed.

Before opening an issue, please search for a duplicate or closed issue.
Please provide as much detail as possible for us to fix your issue.
-->
Please add the ability to view ALL currently "Open Sessions" (connections that are running) directly under the "Connections" icon so that you don't have to search through all of the various folders that you've created to gracefully log out of servers or e...
